long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
(beta version)

An add-on to connect iNaturalist observations to Wikimedia Commons. Adds a "Upload to Commons" button to iNaturalist so users can quickly transfer openly-licensed images to Commons. 

It relies on https://inat2wiki.toolforge.org/ for the heavy-lifting of parsing an observation into the Wikimedia UploadWizard.
